attributes.action: imroving special needs awareness and education in primary schools
attributes.additional_details:
Many people have secial needs children. sadly not all special needs children firstly gets their needs in school adressed correctly Secondly the Staff are poorly educated on disabled children and their needs until and sometimes even when the local SENCO dept involved. The children then areleft to  feel isolated
 as special needs and educating children about special needs does not come into force until secondery school this needs to change lets get disablity awareness put into primary education curriculum and also set this as homework for children to gather information at home and collect leaflets for example then discuss them in class.... more needs to be done to allow disabled children to thrive in mainstream schools better
